title: General Dentistry
text: We provide a wide range of general dentistry services to maintain and restore your oral health. From routine cleanings to complex procedures, our team is equipped to handle all your dental needs.

details.title: Routine Cleanings
details.description: Our routine cleanings help in maintaining oral hygiene and preventing dental issues. We meticulously remove plaque and tartar buildup to prevent cavities and gum disease. Regular cleanings every six months are essential to keep your smile healthy and vibrant.

details.title: Periodontics
details.description: Our periodontal treatments focus on preventing, diagnosing, and treating gum disease. We offer scaling and root planing, periodontal surgeries, and maintenance care to keep your gums healthy and your smile intact. Regular periodontal care is essential for overall oral health.

details.title: Endodontics & Root Canals
details.description: We perform root canal treatments using the latest state-of-the-art technology to save your natural teeth. Our one-visit root canals eliminate bacteria from the infected root canal, prevent reinfection, and save the natural tooth, often a preferred alternative to extraction.

details.title: Fillings
details.description: We provide high-quality fillings to restore decayed teeth and prevent further decay. Using tooth-colored materials, we ensure a natural appearance. The procedure involves removing the decayed portion of the tooth and filling it with a durable material, restoring both function and aesthetics.

details.title: Root Canals
details.description: Our root canal treatments eliminate bacteria from the infected root canal, prevent reinfection, and save the natural tooth. Dr. Keith Brown's expertise ensures a pain-free procedure that preserves your tooth structure, often a preferred alternative to extraction.

details.title: Extractions
details.description: We perform extractions to remove teeth that are damaged or decayed beyond repair. This procedure is done under local anesthesia to ensure your comfort. Post-extraction, we provide detailed instructions for proper healing and discuss options for replacing the extracted tooth if necessary.

details.title: Crowns
details.description: Our custom-made crowns restore the shape, size, and strength of teeth. They cover damaged or decayed teeth, providing protection and restoring function. Crowns are matched to the color and shape of your natural teeth for a seamless look.

details.title: Bridges
details.description: We offer bridges to replace one or more missing teeth. This procedure involves placing crowns on the adjacent teeth and attaching artificial teeth to fill the gap. Bridges help maintain facial structure and distribute bite forces properly.

details.title: Dentures
details.description: Our dentures are removable appliances that replace missing teeth and surrounding tissues. Available in complete and partial forms, our dentures are custom-fitted for comfort and functionality. They improve your ability to chew and speak while enhancing your smile's appearance.

details.title: Sealants
details.description: We apply sealants as a preventive treatment to protect teeth from cavities. A thin, protective coating is applied to the chewing surfaces of the back teeth, keeping food particles and bacteria out of the grooves. This significantly reduces the risk of decay.

title: Cosmetic Dentistry
text: Our cosmetic dentistry services enhance the appearance of your smile. From teeth whitening to veneers, we offer a variety of treatments to help you achieve the smile you've always wanted.

details.title: Teeth Whitening
details.description: Our professional teeth whitening ensures you leave our office looking and feeling great! We use advanced whitening agents that can lighten your teeth several shades in one visit. This treatment removes stains caused by coffee, tea, smoking, and aging, giving you a brighter, more youthful smile.

details.title: Veneers
details.description: Our veneers improve the appearance of your front teeth with thin shells of porcelain or composite resin. Custom-made to match the natural look of your teeth, veneers correct imperfections like chips, gaps, and discoloration, ensuring a flawless smile.

details.title: Bonding
details.description: Our bonding treatment repairs chipped or cracked teeth using a tooth-colored resin. The resin is applied to the damaged area and hardened with a special light, restoring the tooth's appearance and function. Bonding is a cost-effective alternative to other cosmetic treatments.

details.title: Inlays and Onlays
details.description: Inlays and onlays are used to restore decayed or damaged teeth. Made from durable materials like porcelain or composite resin, inlays fit inside the tooth cusps while onlays extend over one or more cusps, providing strength and protection to your teeth.

details.title: Gum Contouring
details.description: Our gum contouring reshapes the gums to improve the appearance of your smile. This procedure corrects uneven gum lines, making teeth look more uniform and enhancing the overall aesthetics of your smile. Often combined with other cosmetic treatments, gum contouring offers optimal results.

details.title: Clear Aligners
details.description: Clear aligners are a discreet alternative to traditional braces for straightening teeth. Nearly invisible and removable for eating and cleaning, aligners gradually shift teeth into the desired position. They offer a comfortable and effective orthodontic treatment option.

details.title: Smile Makeovers
details.description: Our smile makeovers involve a combination of cosmetic procedures to transform your smile. We tailor treatments such as whitening, veneers, and bonding to your unique goals, ensuring a beautiful, confident smile that reflects your personality.

details.title: Dental Implants
details.description: Dental implants replace missing teeth with a durable, long-lasting solution. The implant is a titanium post acting as a tooth root, topped with a crown. Implants look and function like natural teeth, helping to preserve the jawbone and enhance oral health.

title: Emergency Dentistry
text: Our emergency dentistry services are designed to address urgent dental issues promptly. Whether you're dealing with a toothache, a broken tooth, or another dental emergency, we're here to help.

details.title: Toothache Relief
details.description: We provide immediate relief for toothaches and other dental emergencies. Our prompt diagnosis and effective treatments alleviate discomfort and prevent further complications. Your oral health and comfort are our top priorities.

details.title: 24-Hour Emergency Services
details.description: We provide 24-hour emergency dental services for urgent dental issues. Whether it's a toothache, broken tooth, or any dental emergency, our team is ready to assist you day or night. Quick intervention can prevent further complications and ensure your oral health.

details.title: Talk to a Dentist Now
details.description: Need immediate dental advice? Our 'Talk to a Dentist Now' service provides instant access to professional dental consultations. Whether you have a dental emergency or need advice on oral health, our dentists are here to help you right away.

details.title: Emergency Pain Relief
details.description: We offer immediate pain relief for dental emergencies. Our treatments are designed to alleviate pain quickly and effectively, ensuring your comfort and preventing further issues. Don't let dental pain disrupt your lifeâ€”our emergency services are here to help.

details.title: Broken Tooth Repair
details.description: We offer quick repair for broken or cracked teeth. Using bonding, crowns, or veneers, we restore the tooth's appearance and function. Immediate treatment reduces the risk of further damage and infection, ensuring your smile remains intact.

details.title: Knocked-Out Tooth
details.description: Emergency care for knocked-out teeth increases the chances of saving them. If handled quickly, we can reinsert and stabilize the tooth. Proper care and follow-up treatment are essential for recovery and preserving your smile.

details.title: Lost Filling or Crown
details.description: We replace lost fillings or crowns to restore the tooth's function. Temporary solutions protect the tooth until a permanent restoration is placed. Our goal is to ensure comfort and functionality during the interim period.

details.title: Abscess Treatment
details.description: Our abscess treatment prevents infection and alleviates pain. Abscesses are serious infections that can spread if not treated promptly. We drain the abscess and prescribe antibiotics to manage the infection, ensuring your oral health is restored.

details.title: Soft Tissue Injury
details.description: We provide care for injuries to the gums, cheeks, tongue, and lips. Immediate attention stops bleeding, reduces pain, and prevents infection. Our gentle approach ensures a comfortable experience and promotes quick healing.

details.title: Emergency Extractions
details.description: Emergency extractions remove severely damaged or infected teeth. This procedure is done quickly to alleviate pain and prevent further issues. We provide post-extraction care instructions for proper healing and recovery.

details.title: Emergency Root Canals
details.description: Our emergency root canal treatments save infected teeth. This procedure relieves pain and removes infection from the tooth's pulp. Immediate treatment helps prevent the need for extraction and preserves your natural tooth.
